entry.title: RAP & CAP Extension Development
entry.content: I would like to know if its common to see developers who build extensions on top of their S/4HANA system using both CAP and RAP programming models. I understand the difference between these two models - but curious to know if there are developers who have the skills to either use CAP or RAP depending on the requirements.

entry.title: SAP BTP Innovation Day - Coming to Sydney
entry.content:
Come join us in Sydney on March 20, at the Crown for a multi-track event and revolutionise your approach to digital transformation. Aside from exciting keynotes by SAP and partners, the day will be divided into three tracks focussing on Building innovation that deliver business outcomes, leveraging business data fabric for context outcomes, and realising continuous business transformation, where You will hear from SAP and partner experts talking about using innovation and data analytics for transformations for better outcomes.

We will also be talking about:

  • AI-Powered Collaboration: Explore AI-powered tools in SAP Build Code designed to enhance collaboration and boost development efficiency, all while minimising costs
  • Igniting Innovation: Dive into SAP BTP’s AI Foundation, a catalyst for innovation, enabling you to launch competitive business models with efficiency
  • Market Insights: Leverage advanced analytics within SAP BTP to gain invaluable market insights, driving strategic decision-making for your organisation
  • Seamless Integration: Discover the SAP Integration Suite, featuring the new Graph capability, ensuring smooth integration across functions, resulting in streamlined operations

The day will be filled with knowledgeable speakers, exciting content, product showcases and a chance to meet and network with SAP experts and partners.

DATE: 20 March 2024  | TIME: 8:30 am - 4:30 pm 
VENUE: The Crown, 1 Barangaroo Ave, Barangaroo NSW 2000

Click Here to access Registration Page.

entry.title: SAP BTP Exploration Workshops in Sydney
entry.content:
Join us at the SAP Exploration Workshop with BTP in our immersive workshop to have hands-on experience in exploring SAP BTP’s market-leading innovation. Discover how to improve operational cost-efficiencies, drive business growth, and break down technological siloes to streamline business operations.  

This bootcamp will also present you the opportunity to dive deeper into various hands-on sessions.  You can choose from the following hands-on sessions:

  • Discover how SAP BTP empowers business leaders and IT professionals with cutting-edge tech capabilities such as real-time data analytics, ready-to-use AI, and automation, seamlessly integrating your business functions into one unified ecosystem for a more streamlined operation
  • Simplify automation of business processes using no-code & AI services
  • Empower Business Planning and Decision-Making: A Unified Approach with SAP Analytics Cloud Planning
  • Unlock the Power of Business Data Fabric to accelerate your Data-to-Value Journey
  • Become a real-time event driven enterprise using SAP Advanced Event Mesh

With four (4) tracks to choose from, this event provides a forum for SAP BTP customers to experience hands-on, practical applications and get access to the latest innovations across SAP BTP.  Leveraging end-to-end scenarios across Datasphere, Integration Suite and SAP Build, you will have an opportunity to connect with other SAP BTP users, exchange experiences, achievements and insights - whilst also learning form SAP subject matter experts.

Book your free spot now for June 18th.

https://events.sap.com/au/btp-exploration-day-sydney-2024/en/home

entry.title: SAUG BTP Hackathon
entry.content:
During the build phase, the SAP team will assist and hand hold the teams to help them in the implementation of their SAP BTP use cases. SAUG and SAP will help you to work with SAP BTP and also help you build a working prototype for your business use cases. SAP’s team of global BTP experts will enable participating teams on the nuances of the implementation / usage of SAP BTP and will share SAP’s experience and knowledge. There will be 6 enablement webinars which will be deep dives of various BTP technologies and applications. 
 
 
Finalists will be invited to show off their projects in a Demo Jam at the SAUG National Summit in August. The winners will receive recognition and rewards and the whole community will benefit with outstanding learnings from real use cases.
 
We encourage members to send their submissions, nominate their teams and take part in the valuable knowledge building. This will be a great learning opportunity which will develop real-life BTP use cases and deliver direct business value to your organisation.

To know more details of the Hackathon and how to join, please refer to this webpage on SAUG Website

https://www.saug.com.au/Communities/SAUG_BTP_Hackathon

entry.title: SAP Inside Track Event in Auckland : 25 June 2024
entry.content:
The inaugural Auckland SAP Inside Track event is here! Join us for an insightful discussion on the latest trends and best practices in SAP technology. This event is tailored for professionals eager to deepen their knowledge of the SAP Business Technology Platform.

Network with like-minded individuals, share experiences, and gain valuable insights to enhance your skills and career opportunities. Whether you're an experienced SAP professional or just starting in the field, this meetup promises valuable takeaways and fosters connections within the Auckland SAP BTP community.

Join us to hear from few SAP Champions as well as some local BTP #rockstars!

Agenda:
1. Latest Updates from SAP SAPPHIRE - SAP BTP Growth and Acceleration!
2. SAP Cloud Application Programming (CAP) - Riding the Learning Curve!
3. Differentiating GROW and RISE with SAP – How do they compare with setting up a S/4HANA system on-premise
4. How to help your organisation be a Future Ready Enterprise (FRE)

Meet the speakers:

RSVP now to secure your spot at this informative event!

There will be drinks and nibbles after the event.
Space is limited so register early!

Register using the below link
https://www.meetup.com/auckland-sap-btp-meetup-group/events/301356488/

Date: Tuesday, June 25, 2024
Time: 4:00 PM to 5:30 PM NZST
Location:  Lagom, 16 Anzac Avenue · Auckland
